languages.text: {n}Глаза Авеля стекленеют, тело окончательно застывает, словно изваяние, а вокс со щелчком отключается.{/n}
{n}Abel's eyes turn glassy, his body goes completely still, like a statue, and his vox shuts down with a click.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Авеля стекленеют, тело окончательно застывает, словно изваяние, а вокс со щелчком отключается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel's eyes turn glassy, his body freezes completely like a statue, and his vox shuts down with a click.{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}アベルの目は無機質なものになり、身体は彫刻のように完全に固まる。そして彼のヴォクスがカチッと音を立てて閉じた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel's eyes turn glassy, his body goes completely still, like a statue, and his vox shuts down with a click.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベルの目は無機質なものになり、身体は彫刻のように完全に固まる。そして彼のヴォクスがカチッと音を立てて閉じた。{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}亚伯的目光变得呆滞，他的身体像雕像一样一动不动，音阵装置也发出了“咔哒”一声，关掉了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel's eyes turn glassy, his body goes completely still, like a statue, and his vox shuts down with a click.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}亚伯的目光变得呆滞，他的身体像雕像一样一动不动，音阵装置也发出了“咔哒”一声，关掉了。{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abels Augen werden trüb, sein Körper erstarrt komplett, statuengleich, und sein Vox schaltet sich mit einem Klicken ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel's eyes turn glassy, his body goes completely still, like a statue, and his vox shuts down with a click.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abels Augen werden trüb, sein Körper erstarrt komplett wie der einer Statue, und sein Vox schaltet sich mit einem Klicken ab.{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Le regard d'Abel se fait vitreux, son corps se fige à la manière d'une statue et son vox s'éteint avec un bruit sec.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel's eyes turn glassy, his body goes completely still, like a statue, and his vox shuts down with a click.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard d'Abel se fait vitreux, son corps se fige à la manière d'une statue et son vox s'éteint avec un bruit sec.{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Abel se ponen vidriosos, su cuerpo se queda hierático como una estatua y su voco sintetizador se apaga con un chasquido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel's eyes turn glassy, his body goes completely still, like a statue, and his vox shuts down with a click.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Abel se ponen vidriosos, su cuerpo se queda hierático como una estatua y su vocosintetizador se apaga con un chasquido.{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel'in gözleri cama benzer bir hâl alıyor, bedeni heykel misali tamamen hareketsizleşiyor ve bir tıkırtıyla birlikte voksu kapanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel's eyes turn glassy, his body goes completely still, like a statue, and his vox shuts down with a click.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel'in gözleri cama benzer bir hâl alıyor, bedeni tıpkı bir heykel gibi tamamen hareketsizleşiyor ve bir tıkırtıyla birlikte voksu kapanıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
